name: Paper Roses
description:
In a world with kings and queens, and eyes that change colour when they meet with their soulmate pair… to put it quite simply, Kira was just about average. She worked as an average artisan, uncoloured eyes, never been in love and worked tirelessly on a valueless trade of selling paper roses.

The one thing that remained interesting is her best friend, Robin, who continues to be her partner in crime. When everything she cares about is about to be stripped away, Kira is left to decide whether her own happiness is worth it at others’ expense.
